answers.text:
Hi Timmothy, 
Here is a previously answered question which discusses economic development models along with a few other models that other local governments have used in the past. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20790
I hope this helps to answer your question, and any other local government officials please chime in!
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Timmothy Tibbs
text:
Good morning Colleagues!
Can anyone share Economic Development models that you are familiar with or use in your area that provide accurate impacts of investments made in your City or County through grants/incentives. Mecklenburg County provides business investment grants to businesses that wish to relocate in our area. We are considering whether or not we should develop a new model or if there are already reliable models that exist? Any insight would be helpful. Thanks in advance. 
Timmothy
Timmothy.Tibbs@MecklenburgCountyNC.Gov
704-432-2163
title: Economic Development Modeling
